name: Akshat Gairola
bio: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology degree from Graphic Era Hill University. I am in my second year of study with a specialization in Cyber Security. I have a strong interest in understanding how systems work and how to protect them from cyber threats. I enjoy learning about network security, ethical hacking, and data protection techniques. Along with my academic studies, I am continuously working on improving my technical skills through practical learning and projects. I am motivated, disciplined, and always eager to learn new technologies in the field of cyber security.
